topic: Impact of unexamined assumptions on solar energy adoption
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that by examining unchallenged assumptions and their impacts on various areas of my life, I might uncover valuable insights or areas for growth. My next step is to set aside time to reflect on specific aspects such as career, relationships, and personal beliefs, and consciously identify any assumptions that haven't been questioned recently. This will involve journaling or discussing these topics with a trusted friend or mentor to gain new perspectives.
